title: The Unheards
description: A house abandoned for decades, an unheard past lost in time . . . waiting to be heard . . . and the one who will is finally arriving!When the Edment family decides to shift in the abandoned Barcaldine house, a dicey decision soon brings them face-to-face with a lavish residency that seemed the answer to their dream house. Martha wasn't glad of the new development but agreed remorsefully for the sake of her husband and two kids. Little did they know Barcaldine was much more than it appeared.Very soon the house begins to reveal itself through gruesome memories of a gone time, strikes the inmates with its very first haunting and that too meant for the chosen one because the only person who can feel it is Mrs Martha Edment. . .
author: A.K.  Bansal
